skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Instructions :
1. Make sure you have meraki smart devices connected to internet.
2. Make sure you have a valid amazon account and Alexa app installed in your mobile.
3. Install Meraki Home Automation app from store (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.meraki.android).
4. After Logging into Amazon Section in your Meraki App, enable Meraki smart home skill in Alexa app.
5. Then you need to discover your devices to start controlling them using Alexa.

You can turn on your devices by using the voice command "Alexa, turn on light"
You can turn off your devices by using the voice command "Alexa, turn off light"

You can dim your dimmable devices by using the voice command "Alexa, set bulb to 50 percent"

You can execute scenes by using the voice command "Alexa, turn on Good Morning"

NOTE: 
1. Use unique name for devices or create a device group.
2. While naming your device or device group, use space to separate words. eg. "Light 1", "Fan Two", "My Room", "Parents Room".
